Sentencas: The crystal structure of SrCo0.7Fe0.2Nb0.1O2.72 was determined using a combination of precession electron diffraction (PED), high-angle annular dark field scanning transmission electron microscopy (HAADF-STEM) and spatially resolved electron energy loss spectroscopy (STEM-EELS).
Titulo: Layered oxygen vacancy ordering in Nb-doped SrCo1-xFexO3-δ perovskite

Sentencas: The structure has a tetragonal P4/mmm symmetry with cell parameters a = b = a(p), c = 2a(p) (a(p) being the cell parameter of the perovskite parent structure).
Titulo: Layered oxygen vacancy ordering in Nb-doped SrCo1-xFexO3-δ perovskite

Sentencas: Octahedral BO2 layers alternate with the anion-deficient BO1.4 layers, the different B cations are randomly distributed over both layers.
Titulo: Layered oxygen vacancy ordering in Nb-doped SrCo1-xFexO3-δ perovskite

Sentencas: The specific feature of the SrCo0.7Fe0.2NB0.1O2.72 microstructure is a presence of extensive nanoscale twinning resulting in domains with alignment of the tetragonal c-axis along all three cubic direction of the perovskite subcell.
Titulo: Layered oxygen vacancy ordering in Nb-doped SrCo1-xFexO3-δ perovskite
